dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The scroll action removed the visible form elements (two input fields with copy icons) that were present in the BEFORE screenshot. The AFTER screenshot shows only the header with Specter.AI logo and Sign Up button, but no registration form content is visible.
dual_diagnosis.diagnosis: The scroll action scrolled past or away from the registration form content instead of revealing the next part of the form. This suggests either the scroll direction was incorrect, the scroll amount was too large, or there may be an issue with the form layout/positioning.
